starts.title: Both players stretch as high as they can
starts.extra: ... while jumping as high as they can

starts.title: The larger player will try to pick up the smaller
starts.extra: ... and carry them around the room

examples.title: Both players do ten jumping jacks together
examples.extra: High-five after each jumping jack

examples.title: Arm-wrestle for thirty seconds
examples.extra: Switch hands and arm-wrestle for another thirty seconds

examples.title: Both players do push-ups side by side
examples.extra: Do push-ups facing each other, close enough to touch noses

examples.title: The larger player gives the smaller player a piggyback ride around the room
examples.extra: The smaller player must hold on with their legs wrapped around

examples.title: Both players hold a squat position back-to-back for one minute
examples.extra: Interlock arms while squatting

examples.title: The larger player lifts the smaller player in a fireman's carry
examples.extra: Carry them around the room twice

examples.title: Both players do mirror exercises - one leads, the other copies
examples.extra: Maintain eye contact throughout the exercises

examples.title: The larger player holds the smaller player in a bridal carry for thirty seconds
examples.extra: Spin around three times while holding

examples.title: Both players do partner sit-ups, holding each other's wrists
examples.extra: Add a high-five at the top of each sit-up

examples.title: Both players do a wheelbarrow race across the room
examples.extra: The wheelbarrow player must use only one hand

examples.title: The larger player gives the smaller player a shoulder ride around the room
examples.extra: The smaller player must hold on with only their thighs

examples.title: The larger player spins the smaller player in their arms like a dance
examples.extra: Spin faster and dip at the end

examples.title: Both players do partner push-ups - one on top of the other
examples.extra: The top player must maintain contact with the bottom player's back

examples.title: The larger player holds the smaller player against a wall in a standing embrace
examples.extra: Lift the smaller player's legs off the ground

examples.title: Both players wrap arms around each other and spin in circles until dizzy
examples.extra: Fall down together and stay embraced for ten seconds

examples.title: The larger player carries the smaller player in a cradle carry around the room
examples.extra: Rock them gently like a baby for thirty seconds

examples.title: The larger player pins the smaller player to the floor in a wrestling hold
examples.extra: Maintain the pin for thirty seconds

examples.title: Both players do partner yoga - one lifts the other in a supported pose
examples.extra: Hold the pose for one minute with full body contact

examples.title: The larger player holds the smaller player in a full body press against the wall
examples.extra: Smaller player tries to escape for 1 minute

examples.title: The larger player lies on top of the smaller player face-to-face
examples.extra: The smaller player tries to escape for 1 minute

examples.title: Both players do a wrestling match for two minutes
examples.extra: Strip to umderwear first
